name: Parabolic Temple
description:
This is a school project to research the effectiveness videogames have in teaching and learning, please make sure to answer the first section of the survey before playing the game and answer the last two sections after playing the game.

This game is a physics simulation about projectile motion, the purpose is to teach you the relation between initial velocity, angle, distance traveled and gravity.

Assets used
  • Fantasy RPG Soundtrack Music by Alkakrab
  • Modular Temple Pack by Keith a Fertile Soil Productions
  • Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects by Shapeforms
  • Free Skybox textures by Kindaw
  • Free Pro UI Light Minimalism by Wenrexa
